articles.title: European leaders win Trump’s support to pressure Putin into unconditional ceasefire - politico.eu

articles.content: The leaders from the four Kyiv allies had traveled to the Ukrainian capital together by train for a visit of more than nine hours with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The visit came shortly … [+1177 chars]

articles.author: Novaya Gazeta Europe
articles.title: Fico promises Putin veto on EU Russian energy ban - Новая газета Европа
articles.description: Slovakia’s Prime Minister Robert Fico criticised the European Commission’s position on Russian energy at a meeting with Vladimir Putin on Friday evening, the Kremlin has  reported .
articles.content:
Slovakias Prime Minister Robert Fico criticised the European Commissions position on Russian energy at a meeting with Vladimir Putin on Friday evening, the Kremlin has reported.
